name: SparkWorld
description:
In the once peaceful land of Spark was home to many heroes.
Unfortunately their greed struck them as no threat lurks again..
Join demon prince Lucifer and his comrades on his journey
To restore balance to the world of spark! (Game on hold in development)

CONTROLS

  • Arrow Keys / WASD to move
  • Z / J to interact
  • Enter = Start
  • Shift = Select
